Original:

Original: 趁著年貨大街開始跟著人群走，一整路試吃到底，更揹了重重的年貨回家，感受一下過年的氣氛，更在永楽市場好好祭五臟廟，點了一碗600元的丼飯補充能量。

Original:
位於台北中山雅樂軒酒店頂樓17樓的WXYZ BAR，其實朋友訂位的時候有個小插曲，它們一定要用英文訂位，但是店員的英文不太好，一直聽不懂我們要訂的日期，職前訓練有待加強！😎 這是一間裝飾時尚前衛的高空酒吧，雖然占地不大，但是整體動線是舒服的，桌上的仿蠟燭也更添唯美浪漫氣息。

餐點部分，我喜歡「墨西哥雞肉薄餅」，餅皮薄脆，內餡的起司恰到好處，夾了雞肉、番茄、洋蔥及 彩椒，口感豐富有層次。❤️ 「韓式炸雞」我覺得也滿好吃的，味道完全不像韓國，加了印度咖哩粉，很像印度料理，但非常有味道。👍🏻 比較美的這杯是調酒師特地幫我調一杯浮誇的酒，有中國風的fu~~~~真的很謝謝他哈哈，以琴酒為基底加上綠茶、桂花、薄荷與檸檬，非常順口，重點是有酒味。🍸🍹🍻🥂🍷 另一杯就很像果汁了，是萊姆酒+百香果+烏龍的組合。

#我愛小酌#台北酒吧#台北飯店
EN:
WXYZ BAR, on the 17th floor of the top floor of the Yalexia Hotel, Taipei, in fact, there is an episode when booked a place. They must book in English, but the clerk's English is not very good. Pre -job training needs to be strengthened!时 This is a high -altitude bar decorative and avant -garde. Although it does not occupy a large land, the overall moving line is comfortable. The imitation candle on the table also adds a beautiful romantic atmosphere.

In the meal, I like "Mexican Chicken Porte". The cake skin is crispy and the cheese of the filling is just right. The chicken, tomato, onion, and color peppers are rich in taste.❤️ "Korean fried chicken" I think it is also delicious. The taste is not like South Korea. It adds Indian curry powder, which is very similar to Indian cuisine, but it is very delicious.是 The more beautiful cup is a bartender specially helped me adjust a glass of exaggerated wine. There is a Chinese style FU ~~~~ I really thank him. Very smooth, the focus is on the taste of wine.像 The other cup is very similar to the fruit juice.

###Taipei Bar#Taipei Hotel

Original:
捷運中山國小站附近17樓酒吧，有分室內和室外，當天室內只有我們一組客人。環境很安靜，沙發坐起來很舒服。一坐下來服務生有提供花生跟果乾，加分，有配酒小食的酒吧我好愛。

我是用FunNow預定的，方案內容是兩杯調酒和一份雞米花，我們點了Daiquiri 和Aloft Mule，白金會員有多送一杯價值280$的Shot喔！方案的調酒選項比較少，都是經典的調酒，喝起來順口，Daiquiri 比較有酒感，Aloft Mule喝起來像果汁。雞米花很好吃！後來因為太餓還多點了香腸，配著酒一起吃超棒。

服務生的服務100分，也可能是因為當時只有我們一組客人的關係，覺得被照顧的很好。食物上菜速度很快，調酒也是沒有等很久。

不曉得是不是因為是飯店酒吧，菜單上面除了台灣小吃以外的食物都偏貴，想吃但點不起哈哈。推薦給住在附近的人下班可以來小酌約會，用FunNow預定真的太划算了🙏🏻

現在下載FunNow輸入VAJULYA可折抵100元🥰❤️
EN:
The 17th floor bar near the MRT Zhongshan Elementary School Station has indoor and outdoor, and there is only one group of our guests indoors that day.The environment is very quiet, and the sofa is very comfortable.As soon as I sat down, the waiter provided peanuts and dried fruits, add points, and I love the bar with wine and snacks.

I was booked with Funnow. The content of the scheme is two cups of bartending and a chicken rice. We ordered Daiquiri and Aloft Mule. Platinum members have more cups of SHOT worth 280 $!There are relatively few bartending options for the scheme. They are classic bartending. They drink smoothly. Daiquiri is more alcohol. Aloft Mule drinks like fruit juice.Chicken rice flowers are delicious!Later, I was too hungry and I had more sausages, with wine with wine.

The waiter's service 100 points may also be because there was only a group of guests at the time, and I felt that I was taken care of well.The food is fast, and the bartender has not been waited for a long time.

I do n’t know if it ’s because it’ s a restaurant bar. The food on the menu except Taiwanese snacks is expensive. I want to eat it but I ca n’t afford it haha.Recommended for people who live nearby to get a drink for dating, it is really cost -effective to book with funnow 🙏🏻

Now download funnow and enter Vajulya to discount 100 yuan 🥰❤️

Original:
下班了個大早來到這家果然就能夠享受到往外看最美的View，加上中空方體燈飾和粉色系沙發座營造出一種現代卻舒適感。

After getting off work, I can enjoy the most beautiful VIEW out of this one to watch this, plus the hollow hobby lights and pink sofa to create a modern but comfortable sense.

Smoked the meat plate, but each product inside is super salty, the rib eye steak is soft and tender, with a variety of vegetables with a slightly full feeling, but I have to mention this salty crispy chicken rice flower. It's still a perfect match, but it is important to pay attention to it while it is hot. Of course, the basic item of the bartender has the basic model. Original:
這間 bar真的很可惜，食物好吃，bartender親自溝通味道執行出來的調酒很有水準又都有達到需求。
但服務態度極差，嚴重影響用餐氣氛與心情，而且還有 蟑！螂！
［事件一］
上了杯錯酒後，我們說那不是我們點的，服務生說她再去確認。
過了幾分鐘後拿著同一杯剛剛做錯的酒回來，承認剛剛跟吧台講錯了，請我朋友「試試」這杯因為這杯也真的很不錯。

沒錯！服務生去吧台確認完的結果，不是照需求重新出一杯，也不是來說很抱歉做錯的算店家招待。
而是要客人接受他們做錯的調酒!!!!!

我真的很想知道當時吧台或是負責的主管是給了什麼樣的指示，讓第一線的服務人員來跟我們講出這麼不合理的解決辦法。
氣氛尷尬不說，好像我們不接受不嘗試是在為難服務人員，這是我們該承受的嗎？

如果你是不在意服務態度，又恰巧吃飯不喜歡喝水的人，還是很推薦你來。
不像其他地方收水費，或是提供除了瓶裝水以外一般的水，服務人員說他們wxyz bar的定位是「國外的酒吧」，他們不是餐廳是酒吧，他們不是國內等級是國外等級，所以就是不提供一般的水，要喝就是點menu上最低價也要180元/500ml的瓶裝水。
她還問了我們一句：「我們都只提供瓶裝水，如果我提供一般的水，但那濾心沒換過的水你們敢喝嗎？」
請問濾心沒換是我們的問題嗎？？？
一家有餐有酒水的「bar」，我該擔心他們濾心有沒有換嗎？
EN:
This bar is really unfortunate. The food is delicious. Bartender personally communicates the taste of bartending.
But the service attitude is very poor, which seriously affects the atmosphere and mood of the dining, and there are cockroach!dragonfly!
[Incident 1]
After getting into a glass of wine, we said that it was not we ordered, and the waiter said she would confirm again.
After a few minutes, I took the same glass of wine and admitted that I had just said wrong with the bar. I asked my friend to "try" this cup because this cup is really good.

That's right!The waiter went to the bar to confirm the result. It was not a re -cup of demand, nor was it sorry for the wrongdoing.
Instead, guests need to accept their wrong bartending !!!!!

I really want to know what kind of instructions were given at the bar or the responsible supervisor at that time, so that the front -line service staff came to tell us such an unreasonable solution.
The atmosphere is embarrassing, it seems that we are not trying to do it. We should be a dilemma. Is this what we should bear?

If you don't care about the attitude of service and happen to eat and don't like to drink water, you still recommend you.
Unlike other places collecting water fees, or providing water except bottled water, the service staff said that their WXYZ BAR positioning is "foreign bars". They are not restaurants or bars. If you do not provide ordinary water, you need to drink the minimum price of 180 yuan/500ml on the Menu.
She also asked us: "We only provide bottled water. If I provide ordinary water, do you dare to drink the water that has not been changed?"
Is it our problem without changing the heart?IntersectionIntersection
A "bar" with meals and drinks. Should I worry about whether they have changed their hearts?

Original:
這間bar服務極差，好心情都被搞成壞情境，不介意服務的人可以來。
－由於人數較多，確認幾次點餐是否達低消狀況，卻被回覆「煩了我一整晚的低消」
－上酒疑似有誤，第一線的服務生確認回來後，說是點單的失誤，拿著錯誤的同一杯酒問「也很好喝要不要試試看？」我們不想接受錯誤的酒卻也無奈僵著。店家點錯或調錯酒卻要客人接受並付費？
－3～4杯酒上來的速度很慢，點餐完超過30分鐘了都還沒上，卻還要去催促
－用餐環境有約7-8公分的大隻蟑螂
－在確認點餐的低消狀況時，詢問有VIP是否有打折，卻被回應「有折扣優惠，但VIP打折完後會不足低消」。言下之意，VIP會員卻有更高的低消門檻？

絕對不會再來，台北好的bar還有很多
EN:
This BAR service is very poor, and the good mood has been made into a bad situation. Those who do not mind the service can come.
-Because there are a large number of people, it is confirmed that the order of ordering a few times has reached a low condition, but I was replying "I bother me all night to disappear"
-It is suspected to be wrong. After the waiter on the front line confirmed that he was returning, he said it was a mistake. He said with the wrong glass of wine. "Is it delicious?" Helplessly stiff.The store ordered the wrong wine, but the guests need to accept and pay?
-3 to 4 cups of wine are very slow, and the order for more than 30 minutes has not been available, but it has to be urged
-The meal environment is about 7-8 cm large cockroaches
-In the confirmation of the low consumption of ordering, I asked if there was a discount on VIP, but it was responded to "discounts, but VIP will be insufficient after discounting."In the meaning, there is a higher threshold for VIP members?

Never come again, there are many good BAR in Taipei

Original:
餐點飲料不錯，但服務態度及服務品質差

1. 店員點錯單，上了一杯錯的酒我們反應後，店員竟然拿回來希望我們接受這杯點錯的酒，還是照收錢也沒有想要重新做一杯正確的給我們
